nodes.text: This academy was built on the planet of Socorro, and used by the Jedi Order during the reign of the Galactic Republic. It was later destroyed by the Galactic Empire.

This Jedi academy was where Jedi would train to become a Jedi Guardians. It was a favorite of Jedi ace Crix Sunburris during the New Sith Wars. A thousand years later, Darth Sidious would use The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force to locate and destroy the academy and the Jedi who were stationed in it, saving the Galactic Empire time as they hunted Jedi.
